item.title: Best Glyph Icon Libraries available in Market
item.description: If you are not using the Glyph Icon Libraries in you designing, then you are missing a lot! Yes glyph icons libraries are very useful, very flexible and very easy to implement via markup in our web pages. There are many glyph icon libraries out there in the internet. Here i have collected the good glyph icon libraries that are updated frequently with the newer stuff.
